column2: Yoshiwara-honchō-eki) is a railway station in the city of Fuji
column5: operated by the private railway operator Gakunan Railway.

column1: Yoshiwara-honchō Station is served by the Gakunan Railway Line
column2: and is located 2.7 kilometers from the terminal of the line at Yoshiwara.

column1: Yoshiwara-honchō Station has one side platform serving a single bi-directional track. The station is staffed.
Yoshiwara-honchō Station was opened on November 18

column2: the station was used by an average of 1079 passengers daily (boarding passengers only).
